um.title: Photo at the U of M
um.caption: A group photo of us at the University of Minnesota.

um-demo.title: UMN Demo
um-demo.caption: Showing our robot to little kids at the University of Minnesota to get them excited about STEM, just like our library demos.

statefair.title: Minnesota State Fair
statefair.caption: Each year, we bring our robots and Minions to the state fair, driving them around and sharing robotics with the public.

library.title: Library Demo
library.caption: We demoed our Minions and big robots for little kids to spark an interest in robotics.

bestbuy.caption: Teens present on technology topics to inspire the next generation.
